Testing the App¶

The application is built with several unit tests written with the Pytest pacakge.

These tests are located in the ‘tests’ folder in the root project directory.

To run them, simply make sure pytest is installed (see Getting Started) and run the following command while in root directory:

pytest

If everything looks all good, great! If not, either reconsult the Getting Started or back to square one with the API…
